body.p:
You can use the Summarize action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Overview category to ask the AI Positron to summarize the contents of a DITA XML topic.

The Summarize AI action is incredibly useful to end users because it provides a concise and condensed version of a specific content. This AI action saves users significant time and effort by distilling the key points and main ideas into a shorter and more manageable format. It enables users to quickly grasp the essence of the content without having to read through the entire piece, making it ideal for individuals with limited time or those seeking a quick overview. Additionally, the Summarize AI action ensures that users don't miss out on important information or insights, allowing them to stay informed and knowledgeable about various subjects in a more efficient manner.
Open the topic and invoke the Summarize action.
